    Research Papers

    [09] M.L. Dassoundo, On Rota-Baxter and Nijenhuis anti-flexible algebras, ArXiv, 2022 (submitted).

    [08] M.L. Dassoundo and S. Silvestrov, Nearly associative and nearly Hom-associative algebras and bialgebras, ArXiv, 2021 (submitted).

    [07] M.L. Dassoundo, Relative (pre-)anti-flexible algebras and associated algebraic structures, Quasigroups and Related Systems, 30(1), (2022), 31−46.

    [06] M.L. Dassoundo, Pre-anti-flexible bialgebras, Communications in Algebra, 49(9), (2021), 4050-4078.

    [05] M.L. Dassoundo, C. Bai and M.N. Hounkonnou, Anti-flexible bialgebras, Journal of Algebra and its Applications, (2022) 2250212 (23 pages).

    [04] M.N. Hounkonnou and M.L. Dassoundo, q-generalized (anti-) flexible algebras and bialgebras, SUT Journal of Mathematics, 56(2) (2020), 71-92.

    [03] M.N. Hounkonnou and M.L. Dassoundo, Zinbiel algebras and bialgebras: Main properties and related algebraic structures, J. Phys.: Conf. Ser.1194, 012045 (2019).

    [02] M.N. Hounkonnou, M.L. Dassoundo, Hom-center-symmetric algebras and bialgebras, ArXiv, 2017.

    [01] M.N. Hounkonnou and M.L. Dassoundo, Center-symmetric algebras and bialgebras: relevant properties and consequences, Geometric Methods in Physics, XXXIV Workshop 2016, Trends Maths., 261-273.
